item.description:
Join me for an off-season tour of "America's most beloved ball park", historic Fenway Park.
Built in 1912, tours on the hour. Cost $12.

http://boston.redsox....

All tour tickets are sold on a first-come, first-served basis and are subject to availability.
Group tours are offered for a minimum of 40 people.
Please arrive in advance of the hour that you wish to take the tour in order to purchase your tickets.
IN SEASON: The last tour on game days departs three hours before game time, and is an abbreviated tour with field and batting practice access (subject to availability). Cost per person is $20.

INDIVIDUAL RATES
Adults ... $12
Seniors ... $11
Children (3-15) ... $10
ACCESSIBILITY
Tours are fully handicap accessible. Please contact the tour office at 617-226-6666 for additional assistance.
HOURS OF OPERATION
Hours of operation will return to 'In-Season' hours beginning on Monday, March 29
In-Season: 9 a.m. - 4 p.m., every hour on the hour, seven days a week, or until three hours prior to game time.
Off-Season: Fenway Park Tours will be available 9 a.m. - 3 p.m., every hour on the hour, seven days a week. Beginning Sunday, February 7, tours will run from 9 a.m. - 3 p.m. Monday - Saturday; 10 a.m. - 3 p.m. Sunday.
VISIT INCLUDES
50 minute walking tour of the ballpark, guided by an official Fenway Park Tour Guide. All areas are subject to availability.

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Walking tour of Fenway Park -- meet at Gate A -- Yawkey Way
